posts.post_title: F/S - REDUCED! - 1887 /88 Allen& Ginter N28 / N29 Athletes
posts.post_content:
1887 N28 and 1888 N29 Allen & Ginter athletes for sale.  Cards in great shape for their age.  Prices as shown which includes shipping. Mailed payment preferred but will accept PayPal F/F. Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].

Take the final two N29's (East and O'Connor) for $90.

N28 Bogardus - $55 - SOLD
N28 Bubear - $50 - SOLD
N28 Kilrain - $110 - SOLD
N29 East - $50
N29 O'Connor - $50
N29 Ross - $50 - SOLD
N29 Webb - $55 - SOLD
